markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 5" pfs="Standard">[Ode to Ouroboros](/Spells.aspx?ID=729)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Composition" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=31" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 228 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** a creature's [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11) value would reach the value at which they would die.

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Target** the triggering creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Your ode temporarily staves off death. The target's dying condition remains 1 below the value at which it dies. This doesn't help prevent death from effects that kill the target without increasing its dying condition, such as [_disintegrate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=76) and [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects.
name: Ode to Ouroboros

text: Ode to Ouroboros Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 228 2.0 Cast Reaction verbal Trigger a creature's dying value would reach the value at which they would die. Range 60 feet Target the triggering creature --- Your ode temporarily staves off death. The target's dying condition remains 1 below the value at which it dies. This doesn't help prevent death from effects that kill the target without increasing its dying condition, such as disintegrate and death effects.
